title: Thames & Kosmos - EXIT: The Enchanted Forest - Level: 2/5 - Unique Escape Room Game - 1-4 Players - Puzzle Solving Strategy Board Games for Adults & Kids, Ages 10+ - 692875
features: ESCAPE ROOM CARD GAME EXPERIENCE – EXIT: The Enchanted Forest brings the thrilling escape room challenge right to your home. Can you solve the riddles and escape the mysterious forest before it’s too late?

PUZZLE-SOLVING GAME WITH CLUES – Easy-to-understand instructions guide you through the adventure. Work together to solve clues and puzzles, creating the perfect adrenaline rush similar to an actual escape room experience.

FAMILY FUN FOR GAME NIGHT – Ideal for 1 to 4 players, EXIT: The Enchanted Forest is perfect for the whole family. With a moderate difficulty level (2 out of 5), it offers fun challenges for both kids and adults

FOR AGES 10+ WITH A 1-2 HOUR PLAYTIME – Designed for ages 10 and up, this game offers 1-2 hours of immersive gameplay. Perfect for family gatherings, party games, or an exciting game night with friends!
AWARD-WINNING ESCAPE ROOM SERIES – Part of the highly popular EXIT series, this card game provides an engaging and rewarding puzzle-solving experience, adding an exciting new game to your collection.
